attributes.action: Vote of 'No Confidence' in The prime minister Mr. David Cameron, his deputy Mr. Nick Clegg and the present Tory/Lib Dem Coalition Government
attributes.additional_details:
The citizens of Great Britain hold No Confidence in our present coalition government.
We have zero confidence in our prime minister Mr. David Cameron as well as his deputy Mr. Nick Clegg. We strongly request a general election be brought forward to allow the citizens of this great nation the chance to have a democratic vote on on the leadership of this country.
